Package controller

Class Customers

java.lang.Object
controller.Customers
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Customers extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Customers class provides control for the Customers screen.
Author:
Joseph Merritt
